body: @Shin609 the main guy used to teach the little girl. The girl fell in love with the teacher. She gave him a letter confessing her feelings. The guy's wife found the letter and got into a fight. Upset, the guy's friend took him to a brothel to get his mind off of things. The teacher sees a girl who looks like his former student, and chooses her. They end up having sex. The little girl wants to reconnect and talk through Line (a Japanese text app). When teacher pulls out phone, he sees a message from wife apologizing. The teacher goes back to wife, and pretty much leaves and rejects the little girl. Then one day the teacher sees the girl with an older man (sugar daddy), he opens Line and sees a message from the girl saying "go die (go fuck yourself)". The little girl continues prostituting herself.
I love this artist but wasn't expecting her to make such a dark story. I'd love to see this translated.
Dunno bout the entire plot but sheesh that last panel is sucks and it giving me teaching feeling vibe
yeah fuck this guy for not giving his ex student a closure to her letter, he had the chance... not once but twice... poor girl
Can anyone summarize the the story?
Oh wow wtf, that's fucked up, I didn't expect that shit...
